item.title: Overview Dettagliata
item.description: Spaghetti Small, simple language Focus on debugging your application rather than debugging your programming language knowledge. Zig’s entire syntax is specified with a 500-line PEG grammar file. There is no hidden control flow, no hidden memory allocations, no preprocessor, and no macros. If Zig code doesn’t look like it’s jumping away to call a function, then it isn’t.
